mapper.insert: insert into user(id, UserName, Sex, AccountType) values (#{id}, #{userName}, #{sex, typeHandler=Entity.TypeHandler.SexEnumHandler}, #{accountType, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumOrdinalTypeHandler})
mapper.select: select id, UserName, sex, AccountType from user where id = #{id}
select id, UserName, sex, AccountType from user where UserName like concat('%', #{userName}, '%') or sex=#{sex, typeHandler=Entity.TypeHandler.SexEnumHandler}
select id, UserName, sex, AccountType from user where UserName like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
